resources.string:
This App uses bluetooth to track objects you click the Button at the right bottom 
 To search for device, connect to it by clicking,

 When you are connected 
You can click the speaker icon 
To hear your device sound to know where to find it
 You also notified if you left it behind

If you left it behind 
You can check the map to know where you left it,



 But on order for better performance location service must be on when connected
